entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow or rain near noon. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or rain near midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
